lead_paragraph: HIRSCH--Bernard "Bud", 85, passed away peacefully on September 29, 2014. He worked as a television executive for both CBS and NBC from the '50s to the '90s, and, after retirement, traveled the world. He enjoyed travel, food, and his family. He will be missed. He leaves behind his brother (Herbert), two sons (Peter and Richard), three daughters-in-law (Jill, Diane, Bridgette), five grandchildren (Katharine, David, Noah, Rebecca, Graham) and his loving wife Peggy. Services will be at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave, 3:30pm on Sunday October 5th.
